txt.en:
'Thank you for coming, [placeholder]. You have been such a great help to me during my travels. I know you have many questions. We will talk, but first I have one last favour to ask of you.

'I need your help getting to the heart of this place. I am afraid I will not be able to make it on my own. Please help me this one last time, and I promise you that I will answer anything you have to ask.

'This is an evil place, full of unspeakable horrors, but I will guide you true! I only ask for your protection.'

'This is foul news indeed. To think that Sara Oakheart was all along an agent of Angmar. If she is indeed the same Amarthiel of which only legends speak, then evil are the days to come.\n\n'I must consider what you have learned....'
'Are you ready to help me, my friend?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
You have found Sara Oakheart at Barad Gúlaran, the ancient retreat of the Witch-king of Angmar.
Help Sara Oakheart get to the heart of Barad Gúlaran
Sara Oakheart has asked you to escort her into Barad Gúlaran.
Golodir is at Gath Forthnír.\n\nYou should return to Golodir and tell him what happened at Barad Gúlaran.
